issue.title: C++: Enable library builds for 3rd-party users without having to build thirdparty googletest
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-50](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-50). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
While the thirdparty dependencies for libarrow may not always remain so minimal, for now it would be useful to have a library build option where only necessary thirdparty dependencies are built (currently there are none).

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-50?focusedCommentId=15188359) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*

from
